author: ᴛᴀʜɪʀᴀ ʀᴀɴᴀ
text:
When yOur heart becOmes the grave of yOur secret,that desire of yOurs will be gained mOre quickly💭.
#Rumi

author: ᴛᴀʜɪʀᴀ ʀᴀɴᴀ
text:
Not only this decision is questionable,The intellectual capacity of the person who made the decision is also a question. #PUGC is the only facility provided to residents of Gujranwala in context of education and now govt. is trying to snatch it too from us. Shamee!!
#SavePUGC https://t.co/DmZyKe3wtg

text:
